targets.rawSql:
WITH all_jobs AS
(
    SELECT
        jsonPayload.job as job,
        jsonPayload.to as state,
        timestamp
    FROM `sap-kyma-prow.prow_jobs.stderr`
    WHERE jsonPayload.type != "presubmit"
        AND jsonPayload.job NOT LIKE "%test_of_prowjob%"
        AND jsonPayload.to IN ( "success", "error", "failure")
)
SELECT 
    IFNULL(jobs_current.job, jobs_prev.job) as job,
    IFNULL(jobs_current.cnt, 0) as cnt,
    IFNULL(jobs_current.success, jobs_prev.success) as success,
    IFNULL(jobs_current.success, jobs_prev.success) - IFNULL(jobs_prev.success, 0) as difference
FROM
(
    SELECT 
    job,
        COUNT(*) as `cnt`,
        COUNTIF(state = "success") / COUNT(*) * 100 as `success`
    FROM all_jobs
    WHERE timestamp > $__millisTimeFrom(timestamp)
    AND timestamp < $__millisTimeTo(timestamp)
    GROUP BY job
    ORDER BY job
) as jobs_current
FULL JOIN
(
    SELECT 
        job,
        COUNT(*) as `cnt`,
        COUNTIF(state = "success") / COUNT(*) * 100 as `success`
    FROM all_jobs
    WHERE timestamp > TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(UNIX_SECONDS($__millisTimeFrom(timestamp)) - (UNIX_SECONDS($__millisTimeTo(timestamp)) - UNIX_SECONDS($__millisTimeFrom(timestamp))))
    AND timestamp < $__millisTimeFrom(timestamp)
    GROUP BY job
    ORDER BY job
) as jobs_prev
ON jobs_current.job = jobs_prev.job

WITH issues_filtered AS
(
    SELECT DISTINCT 
        number,
        labels_unpacked.name as label
    FROM sap-kyma-prow.github_issues.github_tools_sap_kyma, UNNEST(labels) as labels_unpacked
    WHERE (closed_at IS NULL OR closed_at > $__millisTimeTo(closed_at) )
    and created_at < $__millisTimeTo(closed_at)
)
SELECT 
    current_timestamp() as time,
    label as metric,
    COUNT(*)
FROM issues_filtered
WHERE label LIKE "%incident"
AND number IN (SELECT number FROM issues_filtered  WHERE label = "bug")
GROUP BY label
ORDER BY label

WITH issues_filtered AS
(
    (
        SELECT DISTINCT 
            repository.name as repository,
            CONCAT("https://github.com/kyma-project/", repository.name, "/labels/bug") as url,
            number,
            labels_unpacked.name as label,
            created_at,
            closed_at
        FROM `sap-kyma-prow.github_issues.github_com_kyma_project`, UNNEST(labels) as labels_unpacked
        WHERE labels_unpacked.name = "bug" AND repository.name IN ("kyma", "control-plane")
    )
    UNION ALL
    (
        SELECT DISTINCT
            "SKR" as repository,
            CONCAT("https://github.tools.sap/kyma/", repository.name, "/labels/bug") as url,
            number,
            labels_unpacked.name as label,
            created_at,
            closed_at
        FROM `sap-kyma-prow.github_issues.github_tools_sap_kyma`, UNNEST(labels) as labels_unpacked
        WHERE labels_unpacked.name = "bug" AND repository.name = "backlog"
    )
)
SELECT
    IFNULL(bugs_open.repository, bugs_prev.repository) as repository,
    IFNULL(bugs_open.url, bugs_prev.url) as url,
    IFNULL(bugs_open.cnt, 0) as open,
    IFNULL(bugs_open.cnt, 0) - IFNULL(bugs_prev.cnt, 0) as difference
FROM
(
    SELECT 
        repository,
        url,
        COUNT(*) as `cnt`
    FROM issues_filtered
    WHERE (closed_at IS NULL OR closed_at > $__millisTimeTo(closed_at))
    AND created_at < $__millisTimeTo(created_at)
    GROUP BY repository, url
    ORDER BY repository ASC
) as bugs_open
FULL JOIN
(
    SELECT 
        repository,
        url,
        COUNT(*) as `cnt`
    FROM issues_filtered
    WHERE (closed_at IS NULL OR closed_at > $__millisTimeFrom(closed_at))
    AND created_at < $__millisTimeFrom(closed_at)
    GROUP BY repository, url
    ORDER BY repository ASC
) as bugs_prev
ON bugs_open.repository = bugs_prev.repository
ORDER BY repository

WITH issues_filtered AS
(
    SELECT DISTINCT 
        number,
        labels_unpacked.name as label
    FROM sap-kyma-prow.github_issues.github_tools_sap_kyma, UNNEST(labels) as labels_unpacked
    WHERE created_at >= TIMESTAMP_SUB($__millisTimeTo(created_at), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
    AND (closed_at IS NULL OR closed_at > $__millisTimeTo(closed_at) )
    AND created_at > $__millisTimeFrom(closed_at)
)
SELECT 
    current_timestamp() as time,
    label as metric,
    COUNT(*)
FROM issues_filtered
WHERE label LIKE "%incident"
AND number IN (SELECT number FROM issues_filtered  WHERE label = "bug")
GROUP BY label
ORDER BY label

WITH bugs AS
(
  (
    SELECT DISTINCT 
        repository.name as repository,
        number,
        labels_unpacked.name as label,
        created_at,
        closed_at
    FROM `sap-kyma-prow.github_issues.github_com_kyma_project`, UNNEST(labels) as labels_unpacked
    WHERE repository.name  IN ("kyma", "control-plane") AND labels_unpacked.name = "bug"
  )
  UNION ALL
  (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        repository.name as repository,
        number,
        labels_unpacked.name as label,
        created_at,
        closed_at
    FROM `sap-kyma-prow.github_issues.github_tools_sap_kyma`, UNNEST(labels) as labels_unpacked
    WHERE labels_unpacked.name = "bug"
    AND repository.name = "backlog"
  )
)

SELECT r.* FROM (
    SELECT 
    [
        STRUCT<age STRING, prev INT64, open INT64>
            (
                "Up to 1 week",
                (
                    SELECT 
                        COUNT(*)
                    FROM bugs 
                    WHERE created_at > TIMESTAMP_SUB($__millisTimeFrom(created_at), INTERVAL 7 DAY) 
                    AND created_at < $__millisTimeFrom(created_at)
                    AND (closed_at IS NULL OR closed_at > $__millisTimeFrom(created_at))
                ),
                (
                    SELECT 
                        COUNT(*)
                    FROM bugs 
                    WHERE created_at > TIMESTAMP_SUB($__millisTimeTo(created_at), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
                    AND created_at < $__millisTimeTo(created_at)
                    AND (closed_at IS NULL OR closed_at > $__millisTimeTo(created_at))
                )
            ),
            (
                "Older than 1 month",
                (
                    SELECT 
                        COUNT(*)
                    FROM bugs 
                    WHERE created_at < TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(DATE($__millisTimeFrom(created_at)), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
                    AND (closed_at IS NULL OR closed_at > $__millisTimeFrom(created_at))
                ),
                (
                    SELECT 
                        COUNT(*)
                    FROM bugs 
                    WHERE created_at < TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(DATE($__millisTimeTo(created_at)), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
                    AND (closed_at IS NULL OR closed_at > $__millisTimeTo(created_at))
                )
            ),
            (
                "Older than 3 months",
                (
                    SELECT 
                        COUNT(*)
                    FROM bugs 
                    WHERE created_at < TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(DATE($__millisTimeFrom(created_at)), INTERVAL 3 MONTH))
                    AND (closed_at IS NULL OR closed_at > $__millisTimeFrom(created_at))
                ),
                (
                    SELECT 
                        COUNT(*)
                    FROM bugs 
                    WHERE created_at < TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(DATE($__millisTimeTo(created_at)), INTERVAL 3 MONTH))
                    AND (closed_at IS NULL OR closed_at > $__millisTimeTo(created_at))
                )
            ),
            (
                "Older than 6 months",
                (
                    SELECT 
                        COUNT(*)
                    FROM bugs 
                    WHERE created_at < TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(DATE($__millisTimeFrom(created_at)), INTERVAL 6 MONTH))
                    AND (closed_at IS NULL OR closed_at > $__millisTimeFrom(created_at))
                ),
                (
                    SELECT 
                        COUNT(*)
                    FROM bugs 
                    WHERE created_at < TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(DATE($__millisTimeTo(created_at)), INTERVAL 6 MONTH))
                    AND (closed_at IS NULL OR closed_at > $__millisTimeTo(created_at))
                )
            )
    ] as row
), UNNEST(row) as r

WITH JOBS as (
SELECT
      MIN(CAST(REGEXP_EXTRACT(textPayload, r"(\d+\.\d+)") AS float64)) AS val
    , ANY_VALUE(labels.k8s_pod_prow_k8s_io_job) AS k8s_pod_prow_k8s_io_job
    , MIN(timestamp) as timestamp
  FROM `sap-kyma-prow.total_test_coverage.stdout`
  GROUP BY resource.labels.pod_name
  HAVING k8s_pod_prow_k8s_io_job NOT LIKE "pre-%"
  AND k8s_pod_prow_k8s_io_job NOT LIKE "rel-%"
  AND k8s_pod_prow_k8s_io_job NOT LIKE "%-tests-%"
)
SELECT a.k8s_pod_prow_k8s_io_job
     , b.last_result
     , b.last_timestamp
     , a.samples_cnt
     , a.min_result
     , a.max_result
     , ROUND(COALESCE((b.last_result - b.previous_result), 0),2) AS last_change
     , format("https://status.build.kyma-project.io/job-history/kyma-prow-logs/logs/%s", a.k8s_pod_prow_k8s_io_job)  as link
     , a.stddev
 from 
( SELECT
    k8s_pod_prow_k8s_io_job
  , MIN(val) AS min_result
  , MAX(val) AS max_result
  , AVG(val) AS avg 
  , COUNT(*) AS samples_cnt
  , MAX(timestamp) AS timestamp
  , STDDEV_POP(val) AS stddev
FROM JOBS
GROUP BY k8s_pod_prow_k8s_io_job
ORDER BY k8s_pod_prow_k8s_io_job
) a 
JOIN (SELECT 
   distinct(k8s_pod_prow_k8s_io_job) 
 , FIRST_VALUE(val) OVER w1 AS last_result
 , FIRST_VALUE(timestamp) OVER w1 AS last_timestamp
 , NTH_VALUE(val,2) OVER w1 AS previous_result
FROM JOBS
 WINDOW w1 AS (
    PARTITION BY k8s_pod_prow_k8s_io_job ORDER BY timestamp DESC
    ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING)
) b on a.k8s_pod_prow_k8s_io_job = b.k8s_pod_prow_k8s_io_job

WITH issues_filtered AS
(
    (
        SELECT DISTINCT 
            repository.name as repository,
            number,
            labels_unpacked.name as label,
            created_at,
            closed_at
        FROM `sap-kyma-prow.github_issues.github_com_kyma_project`, UNNEST(labels) as labels_unpacked
        WHERE repository.name IN ("kyma", "control-plane")
    )
    UNION ALL
    (
        SELECT DISTINCT
            repository.name as repository,
            number,
            labels_unpacked.name as label,
            created_at,
            closed_at
        FROM `sap-kyma-prow.github_issues.github_tools_sap_kyma`, UNNEST(labels) as labels_unpacked
        WHERE repository.name = "backlog"
    )
)
SELECT
    IFNULL(issues_open.area, issues_prev.area) as area,
    IFNULL(issues_open.cnt, 0) as open,
    IFNULL(issues_open.cnt, 0) - IFNULL(issues_prev.cnt, 0) as difference,
FROM
(
    SELECT 
        SUBSTR(label,6) as area,
        COUNT(*) as `cnt`
    FROM issues_filtered
    WHERE label LIKE "area/%"
    AND (number, repository) IN (SELECT (number, repository) FROM issues_filtered WHERE label = "bug")
    AND (closed_at IS NULL OR closed_at > $__millisTimeTo(closed_at))
    AND created_at < $__millisTimeTo(created_at)
    GROUP BY label
    ORDER BY area
) as issues_open
FULL JOIN
(
    SELECT 
      SUBSTR(label,6) as area,
      COUNT(*) as `cnt`
    FROM issues_filtered
    WHERE label LIKE "area/%"
    AND (number, repository) IN (SELECT (number, repository) FROM issues_filtered WHERE label = "bug")
    -- get all issues that were created BEFORE the selected period, and still open or closed AFTER/DURING selected period
    AND (closed_at IS NULL OR closed_at > $__millisTimeFrom(closed_at))
    AND created_at < $__millisTimeFrom(closed_at)
    GROUP BY label
    ORDER BY area
) as issues_prev
ON issues_open.area = issues_prev.area

WITH issues_filtered AS
(
  (
    SELECT DISTINCT 
        repository.name as repository,
        CONCAT("https://github.com/kyma-project/", repository.name, "/labels/test-case") as url,
        number,
        labels_unpacked.name as label,
            created_at,
            closed_at
    FROM `sap-kyma-prow.github_issues.github_com_kyma_project`, UNNEST(labels) as labels_unpacked
    WHERE labels_unpacked.name = "test-case"
  )
  UNION ALL
  (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        "SKR" as repository,
        CONCAT("https://github.tools.sap/kyma/", repository.name, "/labels/test-case") as url,
        number,
        labels_unpacked.name as label,
            created_at,
            closed_at
    FROM `sap-kyma-prow.github_issues.github_tools_sap_kyma`, UNNEST(labels) as labels_unpacked
    WHERE labels_unpacked.name = "test-case"
    AND repository.name = "backlog"
  )
)
SELECT 
    IFNULL(issues_open.repository, issues_prev.repository) as repository,
    IFNULL(issues_open.url, issues_prev.url) as url,
    IFNULL(issues_open.cnt, 0) as open,
    IFNULL(issues_open.cnt, 0) - IFNULL(issues_prev.cnt, 0) as difference
FROM 
(
    SELECT 
        repository,
        url,
        COUNT(*) as `cnt`
    FROM issues_filtered
    WHERE created_at < $__millisTimeTo(created_at)
    AND (closed_at IS NULL OR closed_at > $__millisTimeTo(closed_at) )
    GROUP BY repository, url
) as issues_open
FULl JOIN
(
    SELECT 
        repository,
        url,
        COUNT(*) as `cnt`
    FROM issues_filtered
    WHERE created_at < $__millisTimeFrom(created_at)
    AND (closed_at IS NULL OR closed_at > $__millisTimeFrom(closed_at) )
    GROUP BY repository, url
) as issues_prev
ON issues_open.repository = issues_prev.repository
--GROUP BY issues_open.repository, issues_open.url
ORDER BY issues_open.repository

panels.description: New counts all opened in the last 7 days

targets.rawSql:
WITH issues_filtered AS
(
    (
    SELECT DISTINCT 
        repository.name as repository,
        CONCAT("https://github.com/kyma-project/", repository.name, "/labels/priority/critical") as url,
        number,
        labels_unpacked.name as label,
        created_at,
        closed_at
    FROM sap-kyma-prow.github_issues.github_com_kyma_project, UNNEST(labels) as labels_unpacked
    WHERE labels_unpacked.name = "priority/critical"
    )
    UNION ALL 
    ( 
        SELECT DISTINCT 
        "SKR" as repository,
        CONCAT("https://github.tools.sap/kyma/", repository.name, "/labels/priority/critical") as url,
        number,
        labels_unpacked.name as label,
        created_at,
        closed_at
    FROM sap-kyma-prow.github_issues.github_tools_sap_kyma, UNNEST(labels) as labels_unpacked
    WHERE labels_unpacked.name = "priority/critical"
    AND repository.name = "backlog"
    )
)
SELECT
    issues_all.repository,
    issues_all.url,
    critical_open,
    COALESCE(critical_new, 0),
    critical_open -COALESCE(critical_open_prev,0) as difference
FROM
(
    SELECT 
        repository,
        url,
        COUNT(*) as `critical_open`
    FROM issues_filtered
    WHERE (closed_at IS NULL OR closed_at > $__millisTimeTo(closed_at) )
    GROUP BY repository, url
) AS issues_all LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
        repository,
        url,
        COUNT(*) as `critical_new`
    FROM issues_filtered
    WHERE created_at > $__millisTimeFrom(created_at)
    AND created_at < $__millisTimeTo(created_at)
    AND (closed_at IS NULL OR closed_at > $__millisTimeTo(closed_at) )
    GROUP BY repository, url
) AS issues_new
ON issues_all.repository = issues_new.repository
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
        repository,
        url,
        COUNT(*) as `critical_open_prev`
    FROM issues_filtered
    WHERE (closed_at IS NULL OR closed_at > $__millisTimeFrom(closed_at) )
    GROUP BY repository, url
) as issues_prev
ON issues_all.repository = issues_prev.repository
ORDER BY repository

panels.title: Critical issues
